services.title: Our Treatments
services.subtitle: At Baltzar Tandvård, we offer everything from general dentistry to specialized treatments with digital precision.

items.title: Digital Implant Treatment
items.description: Planned and performed with 3D technology for optimal results and minimal intervention.
items.expandedDescription:
Our digital implant treatments represent the absolute latest in modern dentistry. By combining 3D X-ray, digital scanning, and computer-assisted surgery, we can:
• Plan exact placement of dental implants virtually before treatment begins
• Manufacture precision guides for surgical placement
• Minimize surgical interventions and reduce recovery time
• Achieve better aesthetic and functional results
• Create a predictable and safe treatment process

This technology allows us to perform implant treatments with higher precision, less discomfort, and better end results than with traditional methods.

items.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
items.description: Enhance your smile with veneers, crowns, and whitening designed for natural results.
items.expandedDescription:
Our aesthetic dentistry combines science and art to create beautiful smiles that look natural and last long.

We offer a range of aesthetic treatments, including:
• Porcelain veneers - thin shells attached to the front of teeth to correct discoloration, unevenness, or gaps
• Ceramic crowns - complete "caps" that restore damaged teeth with both function and appearance
• Teeth whitening - professional systems for effective and gentle brightening of teeth
• Aesthetic composite fillings - tooth-colored fillings that are both functional and aesthetic
• Dental jewelry and other aesthetic details

With digital photography and virtual planning, you can see your new smile before treatment even begins.

items.title: General Dentistry
items.description: Regular care with focus on prevention and long-term dental health.
items.expandedDescription:
We offer all types of general dental care with a focus on preventive treatment and long-term oral health.

Our general dental services include:
• Comprehensive examinations with digital X-rays for early diagnostics
• Professional teeth cleaning and oral hygiene advice
• Aesthetic tooth fillings with modern materials
• Root canal treatments with advanced technology for better results
• Treatment of gum problems and prevention of periodontal disease
• Support and advice for home routines that promote good oral health

We place great emphasis on early diagnosis and preventive treatment to avoid more extensive and costly treatments in the future.

items.title: Pediatric Dentistry
items.description: Safe and positive dental experience for our youngest patients.
items.expandedDescription:
At Baltzar Tandvård, we have specialized in making dental visits a positive experience even for our youngest patients.

Our pediatric dental care includes:
• Age-appropriate examinations and treatments
• Preventive dental care with fluoride treatments and fissure sealants
• Playful introduction to tooth brushing and oral hygiene
• Gentle treatments with extra focus on being pain-free
• Digital X-rays with minimal radiation
• Advice to parents about diet, habits, and dental care routines

We build trusting relationships with children from an early age to promote a lifelong positive attitude towards dental care and prevent dental anxiety.

items.title: Invisalign Orthodontics
items.description: Invisible teeth straightening for both adults and teenagers.
items.expandedDescription:
Invisalign is a modern alternative to traditional braces, where clear, removable aligners are used to gradually move teeth into the correct position.

The benefits of Invisalign include:
• Nearly invisible aligners that few others notice
• Removable aligners that allow you to eat, brush, and floss as usual
• Digital planning where you can see the end result before treatment begins
• Fewer visits to the clinic compared to conventional orthodontics
• Often shorter treatment time than with traditional orthodontics
• Increased comfort without metal brackets and wires

As certified Invisalign providers, we offer this option for both adults and teenagers who want to straighten crooked teeth discreetly and comfortably.

items.title: Digital Prosthetics
items.description: Custom-made prosthetics designed and manufactured with digital precision.
items.expandedDescription:
Our digital prosthetics represent the next generation of dental replacements with superior results in both function and aesthetics.

We offer digitally designed and manufactured:
• Crowns and bridges with perfect fit and function
• Implant-supported structures for single teeth or full dentition
• Partial and complete dentures with optimal comfort
• Night guards and snore guards
• Temporary prosthetics made on-site with 3D printers

By using digital scanning instead of conventional impressions, we get exact digital models of your teeth, resulting in prosthetics with better fit, appearance, and function.

Our own digital laboratory enables faster delivery and higher precision than with traditional prosthetic solutions.

technology.title: Digital Dental Technology
technology.subtitle: At Baltzar Tandvård, we invest in the latest digital technology to provide you with safer, more comfortable, and more precise treatments.

items.title: 3D CBCT Scanning
items.description: Digital 3D x-ray with low radiation for exact diagnostics.
items.expandedDescription:
CBCT (Cone Beam Computed Tomography) gives us the ability to create detailed 3D images of your jaw, teeth, and surrounding tissue with minimal radiation.

This advanced technology is fundamental to our digital workflow and enables:
• Precise planning of dental implants
• Detailed diagnostics of root canals
• Early detection of pathological changes
• Precise analysis of jaw joints and sinuses
• 3D visualization for patient education

Unlike traditional X-rays, CBCT provides a complete three-dimensional image that can be rotated and studied from all angles. This gives us a diagnostic precision that was previously impossible to achieve.

items.title: Intraoral 3D Scanning
items.description: Digital impression taking without discomfort for perfect fit.
items.expandedDescription:
Our advanced intraoral 3D scanners replace conventional impressions with a fast and comfortable digital process.

By using a small handheld camera, we can create an exact digital model of your teeth and gums in just a few minutes, completely without the discomfort that traditional impression materials can cause.

Advantages of digital impression taking:
• Comfortable and quick process without gagging sensation
• Extreme precision for better fit on crowns and prosthetics
• Immediate visualization of digital models
• Easy storage and access to digital impressions
• Environmentally friendly method that eliminates material waste

The digital models can be used for everything from planning Invisalign treatments to designing crowns, bridges, and other prosthetic work.

items.title: CAD/CAM Technology
items.description: Computer-aided design and manufacturing for precision components.
items.expandedDescription:
CAD/CAM (Computer-Aided Design/Computer-Aided Manufacturing) is fundamental to our digital dental process and enables the design and manufacturing of dental prosthetics with unsurpassed precision.

After 3D scanning of the mouth, we use advanced CAD software to:
• Design crowns, bridges, and implant components with micrometer precision
• Virtually simulate function and aesthetics before manufacturing
• Optimize materials and geometry for maximum durability
• Communicate digitally with the patient about design options

When the design is finished, it is sent to our CAM systems (milling machines and 3D printers) that manufacture the final product with exactly the same specifications as in the digital design.

This gives us the ability to manufacture dental prosthetics with a fit, function, and aesthetics that are superior to traditionally handcrafted alternatives.

items.title: AI-assisted Analysis
items.description: Artificial intelligence for improved diagnostics and treatment planning.
items.expandedDescription:
We use advanced AI systems that complement our dentists' expertise and improve diagnostic precision and treatment outcomes.

Our AI algorithms are trained on millions of dental data and help to:
• Identify cavities, cracks, and periapical lesions that can be difficult to detect
• Analyze bite development and suggest optimal orthodontic treatment
• Predict long-term outcomes of different treatment options
• Detect early signs of gum problems and other risk factors
• Optimize the design of dental prosthetics based on biomechanical principles

The AI technology serves as a decision support for our clinicians, and each AI suggestion is carefully reviewed by our specialists. This provides a combination of technological precision and human expertise for the best possible care.

items.title: Digital Treatment Planning
items.description: Interactive planning and visualization of treatment results.
items.expandedDescription:
Our digital treatment planning makes it possible to simulate, visualize, and optimize your treatment before it begins.

With advanced software, we can:
• Create a digital twin of your oral cavity for virtual treatment simulation
• Visualize the end result of aesthetic treatments
• Simulate tooth movement during orthodontic treatment
• Optimize implant positions for best function and aesthetics
• Plan complex reconstructions step by step

This technology not only provides better treatment results but also makes you an active participant in the planning. You can see different treatment options, better understand the process, and have realistic expectations for the end result.

Digital treatment planning also reduces the risk of unexpected complications during treatment, as many potential problems can be identified and solved in the virtual planning phase.

items.title: 3D Printed Guides & Models
items.description: Custom surgical guides and working models for precision.
items.expandedDescription:
We use advanced 3D printing technology to manufacture precision components that are crucial for modern dental treatments.

Based on digital 3D scans and treatment planning, we can print:
• Surgical guides for exact implant placement
• Working models for prosthetic manufacturing
• Temporary prosthetics and treatment guards
• Orthodontic aligners for teeth straightening
• Demonstration models for patient education

Our 3D printers use biocompatible materials with medical certification and can produce components with micrometer precision.

3D printed surgical guides are particularly valuable in implant treatments, as they ensure that implants are placed exactly according to the digital plan, minimizing risks and optimizing treatment outcomes.
